name: Cowboy Escape
description:
Hardcore runner platformer.
You play for Cowboy, whose goal is to go through all levels without falling into an abyss.

- Multiple levels
- Pleasant graphics
- Great soundtrack
- Multiple game modes
- You can play one or the other on one PC
- Hardmode - difficulty in this mode is increased

Control:
Player 1 WASD
Player 2 YGHJ
